updateClients = (updatedClients) => { this.setState({ clients: updatedClients }); }; changeTab = (tabName) => { this.setState({ selectedTab: tabName }); }; renderShippingRequests() { return ( ); } renderNavigation() { return ( ); } renderTabContent() { switch (this.state.selectedTab) { case 'shipping-requests': return this.renderShippingRequests(); case 'home': default: return ; } } render() { return (
{this.renderNavigation()}
{this.renderTabContent()}
); } } export default App;
